name: Magical Garden (zooperdan)
description:
Description

My entry to Spring 2D Jam 2022. Theme: Spring and Garden.

Didn't have time to create more levels and properly test those are there. Will maybe do that post-jam.

Controls
  • Move = A/D or LEFT/RIGHT
  • Jump = W or UP
  • Shoot = SPACEBAR

Game should also work with gamepad.
